title: In which countries does Forensic Scientists get paid the most (on the basis of salary)? - Quora
tags: Salaries for Specific Jobs and Careers

response.answer_text: On an average Luxembourg gives the most salary to its workers. However Luxembourg has nearly zero crime rate. So I am not sure if there is any scope of a forensic scientist. On 2nd place is USA in terms of salaries so my guess will be forensic scientists should have the brightest career in the USA as it has ample crime and good salaries.
